heading: VSColab
description: Using this package we can ssh into the Google Colab instance and also perform remote developement using VSCode .Use Google Colab GPU's and TPU's via an ssh connection locally in your device. Very Useful for students who want to get their first taste at Linux OS and developers who want to overcome the paywall of using the terminal feature in Colab Notebooks.

heading: Scorder
description: Your simple Media Recorder. Fast, Functional and Free. Record media on the go, without the hassle of complicate Software.

heading: OCR Resnet
description: This is my implementation of an OCR using Resnet. Resnet is one of the best Neural Network architectures for image classification and it's biggest advantage is the fact that as the network depth increases, it cancels negative outcomes. I have used the MNIST dataset for numbers and A_Z dataset from Kaggle for the letters.Accuracy is around 96%.

heading: Oppty
description: I worked as a freelance dev for this projects where we managed to develop a portal that enables professionals to simplify the hiring process with the help of AI
